name: ADS Wallet
description: Secure identity vault for Adshares network.
author: https://adshares.net/
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 http://127.0.0.12:5000 https://rpc.adshares.net https://rpc.e11.click data:; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com
